name: Generate AutoGPT Agent
description: Generates a new AutoGPT agent code file based on project, issue, and agentic mapping context.

required.name: agent_name
required.description: Name of the agent to generate.

optional.name: template
optional.description: Template to use for agent code generation.

commands.description: Render agent code template with provided parameters.
Write generated agent code to the appropriate directory.

post_conditions: Agent code file exists and passes schema validation

error_handling.action: Retry file write up to 2 times.
